content.rendered:
Sofa Style Retro Glam, Statement Piece
Brand Furniturezone.pk
Seat Base Support Foam
Upholstery Material Velvet Fabric

excerpt.rendered:
Transform your living experience and make a statement that resonates with discerning taste. Unveil the celestial allure of our Seashell Sofa – where artistry meets comfort in every curve and contour. Purchase online now and invite the essence of luxury into your home.

Crafted with meticulous detail, the Celestial Luxe Seashell Sofa features a distinctive barrel-back design, offering a harmonious balance of style and plush comfort. The generously padded seat and backrest, upholstered in sumptuous Velvet Fabric, create a luxurious retreat in the heart of your home.

Alfie 2 Seater Velvet Sofa Material

  • Velvet Fabric
  • Serpentine Spring and Foam Upholstery
  • Stainless Steel in Gold Plated finish

Alfie 2 Seater Velvet Sofa Dimensions: 

Width (cm) 65 to 68 inches
Depth (cm) 32 inches
Height (cm) 34 to 36 inches
Inner Space 48 inches

 

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
